cause.description:
Nuclear energy is a safe, economical technology which should be part of a diversified energy mix. Nuclear is an emissions-free option that can help reduce the threat of global climate change.
The North American Young Generation in Nuclear unites young professionals who believe in nuclear science and technology and are working together throughout North America to share their passion for a field that is alive and kicking!
1. Nuclear energy should be part of a diversified energy mix.
2. Nuclear energy is a safe and proven technology.
3. Nuclear energy can help minimize climate change.
cause.name: True Environmentalists Support Nuclear
